Package com.lmax.solana4j.api

Interface InstructionBuilderBase

All Known Subinterfaces:
InnerInstructionBuilder, InstructionBuilder
public interface InstructionBuilderBase
Base interface for building instructions in a Solana blockchain transaction.

This interface provides methods for specifying accounts, programs, and data associated with the instruction.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    InstructionBuilderBase
    account(PublicKey account, boolean signs, boolean writes)
    Adds an account to the instruction with its role specified.
    InstructionBuilderBase
    data(int size, Consumer<ByteBuffer> writer)
    Sets the data for the instruction.
    InstructionBuilderBase
    program(PublicKey account)
    Specifies the program to be executed by the instruction.

  • Method Details

    • account

      InstructionBuilderBase account(PublicKey account, boolean signs, boolean writes)
      Adds an account to the instruction with its role specified.
      Parameters:
      account - the PublicKey of the account
      signs - indicates if the account signs the transaction
      writes - indicates if the account writes in the transaction
      Returns:
      this InstructionBuilderBase instance for method chaining

    • program

      InstructionBuilderBase program(PublicKey account)
      Specifies the program to be executed by the instruction.
      Parameters:
      account - the PublicKey of the program account
      Returns:
      this InstructionBuilderBase instance for method chaining

    • data

      InstructionBuilderBase data(int size, Consumer<ByteBuffer> writer)
      Sets the data for the instruction.
      Parameters:
      size - the size of the data in bytes
      writer - a Consumer that writes the data to a ByteBuffer
      Returns:
      this InstructionBuilderBase instance for method chaining
